detaileddescription.para: Get type name as string

Compare with selected type
Set _rect - part of texture where we take tiles
Set _coord - part of texture where we take tiles
Set _tile size

Set current tile index
_index
- tile index
Tiles in file start numbering from left to right and from top to bottom. For example:
+---+---+---+ | 0 | 1 | 2 | +---+---+---+ | 3 | 4 | 5 | +---+---+---+
Get current tile index

briefdescription.para: Get index of selected item (ITEM_NONE if none selected).
Insert an item into a list at a specified position.
Add an item to the end of a list.
Replace an item at a specified position.
Delete item at a specified position.
